philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.content: Qiejingxuan is dedicated to connecting artists with art enthusiasts. Through professional curation and custom services, we ensure every artwork finds its home and every artist's talent is recognized.

cta.title: Begin Your Art Journey
cta.subtitle: Whether collecting or commissioning, we provide professional services
cta.description: Qiejingxuan is a professional platform connecting artists and collectors. With Eastern aesthetics at our core and a global market perspective, we are dedicated to discovering and promoting exceptional contemporary artworks.

hero.title: Connecting Artists with the World
hero.subtitle: Qiejingxuan is dedicated to discovering and promoting talented contemporary artists. Through professional curatorial services and a global perspective, we enable exceptional artworks to transcend geographical boundaries, reaching wider audiences for appreciation and collection.

introduction.title: About Qiejingxuan
introduction.content1: Founded in 2024 and headquartered in Tokyo, Qiejingxuan is an international art organization specializing in the promotion of Asian contemporary art. We represent exceptional artists from China, Japan, South Korea, Europe, and the Americas, covering diverse artistic forms including painting, sculpture, installation, and new media.
introduction.content2: We believe art is a language that transcends cultures and a bridge connecting hearts. Through carefully curated exhibitions, professional art consulting, and custom services, we help collectors discover valuable artworks while providing artists with international exhibition platforms and career development support.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To discover and promote contemporary artists with unique artistic languages and profound thinking. Through professional curation, consulting, and promotion services, we ensure exceptional artworks receive the recognition they deserve, making art an integral part of more people's lives. We strive to build bridges between artists and collectors, facilitating dialogue and exchange between Eastern and Western art.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To become one of Asia's most influential contemporary art promotion platforms. With professional services and an international perspective, we aim to bring more exceptional Asian artists to the world stage, making contemporary art a vital force that connects different cultures, inspires thought, and enriches lives.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive professional services for artists and collectors

service1.title: Artist Representation
service1.description: Providing comprehensive career development support and international promotion services for talented artists

service2.title: Curation & Exhibitions
service2.description: Curating high-quality art exhibitions to provide optimal presentation for artists' works

service3.title: Art Commissions
service3.description: Offering professional art customization and consulting services for private and corporate clients

service4.title: International Exchange
service4.description: Facilitating exchange between Eastern and Western art communities, expanding artists' international markets

milestone1.title: Qiejingxuan Founded
milestone1.description: Established in Tokyo, beginning representation of our first three exceptional artists. Established brand positioning centered on Eastern aesthetics with an international market focus.

milestone2.title: International Expansion
milestone2.description: Represented artists grew to five, with works exhibited in New York, Singapore, and Hong Kong. Organized our first 'Oriental Impressions' themed exhibition, gaining widespread industry recognition.

team.title: Core Team
team.subtitle: Professional team of seasoned art industry experts

founder.name: Hitomi Tosaka
founder.bio: With 15 years of experience in the art industry, having worked at multiple internationally renowned galleries with deep understanding of the Asian contemporary art market.

curator.name: Chen Siyuan
curator.bio: Graduate of University of the Arts London, has curated multiple significant contemporary art exhibitions, excelling at discovering artists' unique value.

director.name: Yuko Tanaka
director.bio: Senior art advisor with extensive experience in art authentication, market analysis, and collection consulting.

cta.title: Begin Your Journey with Us
cta.subtitle: Whether you're an artist or collector, we look forward to connecting with you

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We look forward to hearing from you

form.name: Name
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us your needs or questions
form.fileHint: Optional: Upload related images or files

success.title: Submitted Successfully!
success.message: Thank you for your message. We will get back to you as soon as possible.

footer.description: An independent art studio dedicated to contemporary art presentation and communication. Offering art promotion, curatorial services, and commissioned creations.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Qiejingxuan (hereinafter referred to as "we" or "us") values your privacy protection. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect personal information you provide when using our website.

collection.title: Information Collection
collection.content: We may collect the following types of information:
collection.item1: Personal Information: Contact information such as name, email address, phone number
collection.item2: Usage Information: Browsing behavior, IP address, device information when visiting our website
collection.item3: Submitted Content: Messages, files submitted through contact forms
collection.item4: Cookie Data: Website usage data to improve user experience

use.title: Use of Information
use.content: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
use.item1: To provide and improve our services
use.item2: To respond to your inquiries and requests
use.item3: To send important notices and updates
use.item4: To analyze website usage to optimize user experience

protection.title: Data Protection
protection.content: We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. We do not sell, trade, or transfer your personal information to third parties unless we have your explicit consent or are required by law.

cookies.title: Cookie Usage
cookies.content: Our website uses cookies to improve user experience. You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings. Disabling cookies may affect certain features of the website.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: Under applicable data protection laws, you have the following rights:
rights.item1: Right of Access: To view your personal information we hold
rights.item2: Right of Rectification: To correct inaccurate or incomplete information
rights.item3: Right of Erasure: To request deletion of your personal information
rights.item4: Right to Object: To object to our processing of your personal information

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us through:

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to the Qiejingxuan website. By using this website, you agree to comply with the following Terms of Use. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use this website.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using the Qiejingxuan website, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time, and the modified terms will take effect immediately upon publication on the website.

use.title: Use of Website
use.content: You agree to use this website in a lawful and appropriate manner and comply with the following provisions:
use.item1: Do not use this website for any illegal activities
use.item2: Do not interfere with or disrupt the normal operation of the website
use.item3: Do not access any part of the website without authorization
use.item4: Do not upload or transmit any malware, viruses, or harmful code

ip.title: Intellectual Property
ip.content: All content on this website, including but not limited to text, images, logos, designs, software, etc., is the intellectual property of Qiejingxuan or its licensors and is protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. No content may be copied, modified, distributed, or used without explicit written permission.

userContent.title: User Submitted Content
userContent.content: Any content submitted through this website (including but not limited to messages, files, images, etc.) will be considered non-confidential and non-proprietary. You grant Qiejingxuan a worldwide, royalty-free, irrevocable license to use, copy, modify, distribute, and display such content.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Qiejingxuan shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use this website. We strive to ensure the accuracy of website information but do not guarantee the completeness and accuracy of all information.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Use at any time. Significant changes will be notified in a prominent location on the website. Continued use of this website indicates your acceptance of the modified terms.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Use, please contact us through:
